name: Melt The Ice
description:
An Online-Multiplayer party game made with short and quick gameplay to enjoy with your friends!

The fire has come to life and you need to catch it before you freeze! Be careful, it might be turning you all against each other.

Made by the wonderful people named in the credits tab, along with some royalty-free songs found online

Made for the "A Very Funky JamMax 2020"
